page.title: 13VILLAGE LIFE,STISTED
page.content: {*}Mrs.Earle has lived in the area all her life.She is now aged seventy-four. She enjoys the community spirit and quiet of the village and spends some of her spare time supporting the Womens'Institute,Mothers'Union and Community Association. {*}She shops locally as the village shop stocks most of what she needs and it is difficult for the old to get out of the village to shop elsewhere.She has seen the population of the village decline although the number of houses has increased;there are now more,but smaller,families.The younger people have their own cars and do not need a bus service.Consequently this is infrequent and expensive(65p to Braintree).The village no longer has a doctor or dentist,but a district nurse will call if requested.Sheltered housing for the elderly is needed.
